setError(error.message); } setIsLoading(false); }, []); useEffect(() => { fetchNoteHandler(); }, [fetchNoteHandler]); const pwHandler = (pw) => { if (pw === correctPw) { setIsCorrect(true); } console.log(pw); }; async function addNoteHandler() { const response = await fetch( "https://react-http-2887f-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/inven.json", { method: "POST", body:
